frontmatter.title: Australia's home for Polaroid and Instant Camera Repairs

content: Years of hands-on experience with hundreds of cameras means your beloved Polaroid is in safe hands. We've seen it all.
From simple cleanings to complex electronic repairs and custom modifications, we bring your camera back to life.
Based in Perth - Australia, but we happily accept repairs from and ship cameras to anywhere in the world.

My name is Jake, the guy behind The Instant Camera Guy. What began as a personal passion for these incredible cameras quickly evolved into an obsession: understanding how they work and, more importantly, how to fix them when they don't.

Today, I operate as an ABN-registered sole trader specializing in the sales, servicing, restoration, and modification of classic Polaroid cameras.

 Polaroids are my main specialty, I also occasionally restore other film cameras, such as the Mamiya C series and Graflex Speed Graphics. My business is primarily focused on client repairs, so I don’t regularly sell refurbished cameras. However, I do find, restore, and sell them on occasion. Cameras for sale are typically listed on my Instagram page.

I ship Australia-wide and am happy to ship pretty much anywhere overseas—just ask for a quote! All cameras I sell are guaranteed to work and come with a 6-month comprehensive warranty. I believe in preserving the magic of instant photography for generations to come.

We offer a full range of services to get your camera working perfectly.

*   **General Repair:** Fixing common issues like gear failures, motor problems, and electronic faults. Estimates are free of charge and prices for servicing will depend on the camera. 
*   **SX-70 Conversion:** Convert your SX-70 to use the more common and versatile 600-type film.
*   **New Lenses:** Replace scratched or damaged lenses to bring back sharpness.
*   **Battery Modifications:** Modern battery solutions for older camera models. Conversion to AAA batteries.
*   **General CLA:** A full Clean, Lubricate, and Adjust service to ensure your camera is in top shape.
*   **Reskinning:** Replace worn or damaged leather with fresh, new skins in various colors.
We're always working on new projects, blog posts, and guides. Stay tuned for more content!
A gallery of our favorite shots and camera restorations is coming soon! Check back for inspiration.

For the quickest response and a quote, please message us on Instagram. You'll find our up-to-date price lists and see our latest work there. Facebook is also great!

Please only email if this is your last option, as we use it less frequently..
